meanings.definition: A region or part of a town, a country, or the world.
meanings.sent1: The playground is a fun area for kids to play.
meanings.sent2: The park is a beautiful area for picnics and walks.
meanings.sent3: The area around the ice cream truck suddenly became the most popular spot in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the entire area like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The area was so vast that it seemed to stretch on forever.

meanings.definition: A space within a building or piece of land that is used for a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen area is where we prepare our meals.
meanings.sent2: The parking area was full, so we had to find another spot.
meanings.sent3: The area designated for dancing was too small for the energetic group.
meanings.sent4: Her desk area was always neat and organized, unlike mine.
meanings.sent5: The play area in the backyard was perfect for the children to enjoy.

meanings.definition: A subject or range of activity or knowledge.
meanings.sent1: Mathematics is a challenging area for many students.
meanings.sent2: The field of science covers a wide area of study.
meanings.sent3: The area of history that focuses on ancient civilizations is my favorite.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in the area of technology is impressive.
meanings.sent5: Exploring new areas of interest can be both exciting and rewarding.
